section.name: Welcome the JBundle Project!
section.p: JBundle is a collection of open-source tools for writing applications for the Internet.

subsection.name: OSGi Web Servlet Project
subsection.p: An OSGi to Web Start servlet. Use this servlet to deploy your OSGi apps to a web client.

subsection.name: Simple Web Servlets Project
subsection.p: A collection of simple web servlets. Use these templates to setup your basic servlets.

subsection.name: JCalendarButton Project
subsection.p: JCalendarButton. A Swing component that displays a popup calendar.

subsection.name: Calendar Panel Project
subsection.p: Calendar Panel. A calendar for java swing applications.
